channel.title: Whats the stupid's thing u ever did?
channel.description:
(august 2008 )I was home alone and my phone was ringing , I toke the phone and said hello no response all I heard was a breath so that was pretty scary That guy/girl idk kept calling me without saying something to make me scared . Few minutes later I heard footsteps on the roof , so i toke my bat ready to use + putted my mobile phone on the number 100 (the number of the police here) and I axidently called to the police 10 minutes later the phone goes again , I pick up (taught it where those creeps again ) SO i said could u fu*k af and stop calling me . then on the other side of the phone saying this is the police U called us? (Dam u didn't want to see me when I heard that) I almost had to pay because calling for fun. but I explained it to the guy . (oktober 2009) I putted fireworks on for a friend's birthday at a lake but because of the wind it returned to our way and exploded 2 meter above an house 10 minutes later the cops came and asked me and my friend did you saw any hooligans using fireworks loll funniest of all
Here's the top 4 from the most stupid thing
[b]New Top 4[/b] [quote="Noobie22"]smoke cannabis in my room while my grandma was home. :o[/quote] [quote="krackkid"]I almost made a godsword irl, out of aluminum foil.[/quote][quote="`Lewk_"]I was hanging out with my friend, and we went to this apartment, and there was a parking outside, with a few cars there. So suddenly, I got the idea. To take a shit, and put it on a car. So this is what I did, I went behind the bush, I took a shit. I picked it up with a news paper, and i put it on the car. Few minutes later, it started raining. So she put on her wipers. Uh, long story short, she didn't notice, put on her wipers and there was shit smeared all over her windshield. It was stupid. I don't regret it, but it was stupid. Rofl, note that we were like 9.[/quote] [u]And the nUmBeR still number OnE [/u] [quote="krackkid"]I stole from a pizza man with a knife, without a mask and at my own house, and I let him go-.-...[/quote]
stupidest reply [quote="spank"]I went back for a firework and it blew up in my face and cut for myself for the lulz.[/quote][quote="sick sub1"]y would u feel sorry to the trampoline it didnt break[/quote] [quote="spank"]I went back for a firework and it blew up in my face and cut for myself for the lulz.[/quote][quote="sick sub1"]y would u feel sorry to the trampoline it didnt break[/quote]

item.title: Whats the stupid's thing u ever did?
item.dc:creator: @runescapemod runescapemod
item.description:
@runescapemod wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:53, topic:319508”][quote author=Jerome123183 link=topic=415969.msg3065044#msg3065044 date=1261168666]
I was talking on the phone with my friends and someguy keep calling saying I’m going to rape you and then I hung up. I heard a car pull up in the drive way( parents just left to got Christmas shopping ) and then I took my fathers shotgun ( Navy ) and then the phone rang and the guy said I see you! I shot the fucking car door outside my house on my front porch and I heard the phone ring I said " you fuckin physco I shot your car come anywhere near me faggot and I’ll blow your brains out!" then this happened “Jerome your ass is mine the fuck you talking about!?!?!?” and who came out the car was my grandma and it was a new car. I got grounded for 2 months and you know I’m black and I got an asswipen. My grandma was pissed and said" WTF?, You dumbass I said i was coming over to drop off your xbox!" And I found out it was my faggot ass uncle which laughed his ass off and I will not forget this.
[/quote]

Oh, yes, because you just step off the porch and shoot a car in your driveway because you think it’s a rapist.

Oh, shit, my mom just pulled in! Brb shotgun[/quote]

That deserves a ROFL! oh shit one sec theres my mom shotgun

Read full topic
